scenes.action_text: CHRONICLE Written by Max Landis Based on a story by Josh Trank and Max Landis FROM ANDREW'S FIRST CAMERA. CUT - to indicate time lapses within a scene INT. DETMER RESIDENCE - ANDREW'S ROOM The room is dingy. Unkempt. The camera sits on the bed, on its side, facing the door. We can hear someone moving around off screen. The door handle clicks; someone's trying it. Then nothing. Then, suddenly, loud pounding on the door. Andrew's voice is
